name: Duckling
description:
A tiny game about helping a duckling cross a busy street

The original game idea I had was meant for a 3D game, however, as I was on holiday away from my pc, I decided to give it a try in 2D on the android version of Tic-80. It didn't really hit the atmosphere I was going for (atmosphere is really hard to do in 2D if you have no art skills, who would've thought :)), but I still think it's quite good for a 2-day side project

Let me know what you think!

Controls:

Left/Right arrow - move

Z - jump
